articles.title: New mpox strain in DR Congo 'most dangerous yet' - BBC.com
articles.description: A current outbreak of the virus in the African country is "concerning", say health officials.
articles.content:
By Philippa Roxby, Health reporter
Mpox, formerly called monkeypox, is a viral infection and can be deadly
A new strain of the mpox virus spreading quickly along the eastern border of Democratic Re… [+4942 chars]

articles.author: icc
articles.title: Semi-Final Preview: History beckons for South Africa or Afghanistan in the Caribbean - ICC Cricket
articles.description: A first appearance in a Men’s World Cup Final is on the line when South Africa host Afghanistan in the first semi-final at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024.
articles.content: South Africa: Aiden Markram (c), Ottniel Baartman, Gerald Coetzee, Quinton de Kock, Bjorn Fortuin, Reeza Hendricks, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, David Miller, Anrich Nortje, Kagiso… [+320 chars]
